mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pass_self(pass_self_no, comno, cor_memberno, pass_self_title, pass_self_item1, pass_self_item2, pass_self_item3, pass_self_item4, pass_self_item5, pass_self_ans1, pass_self_ans2, pass_self_ans3, pass_self_ans4, pass_self_ans5, pass_self_date) VALUES(pass_self_seq.nextval, #{comno}, #{cor_memberno}, #{pass_self_title}, #{pass_self_item1}, #{pass_self_item2}, #{pass_self_item3}, #{pass_self_item4}, #{pass_self_item5}, #{pass_self_ans1}, #{pass_self_ans2}, #{pass_self_ans3}, #{pass_self_ans4}, #{pass_self_ans5}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT p.pass_self_no, p.comno, p.cor_memberno, p.cor_memberno, p.pass_self_title, p.pass_self_date, p.pass_self_views, c.com_name FROM pass_self p, com_intro c WHERE p.comno = c.comno ORDER BY pass_self_no DESC

SELECT pass_self_no, comno, cor_memberno, pass_self_title, pass_self_item1, pass_self_item2, pass_self_item3, pass_self_item4, pass_self_item5, pass_self_ans1, pass_self_ans2, pass_self_ans3, pass_self_ans4, pass_self_ans5, pass_self_date, pass_self_views FROM pass_self WHERE pass_self_no = #{pass_self_no}
